definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Some reserves were named to cover the possibility of withdrawals.
sentences.chinese: 已指明一些替補隊員，爲可能有人退出比賽作準備。

sentences.english: It gives developers direction as to where the changes should occur.
sentences.chinese: 它向開發人員指明變更將在哪裏發生的方向。

sentences.english: Circulation areas and storage areas will be indicated on the site installation drawing.
sentences.chinese: 週轉區域和倉儲區域需在現場安裝圖上指明。

sentences.english: It indicates that the annotated method is overriding a method in a superclass.
sentences.chinese: 它指明註釋的方法將覆蓋超類中的方法。

sentences.english: I'm again, saying print argument's new line.
sentences.chinese: 我再次指明，打印參數的新行。

sentences.english: It pinpoints the "current position" on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 它指明屏幕上的“當前位置”。

sentences.english: Forth argument stands for the length of the variable and the fifth one specifies the value of the parameter.
sentences.chinese: 籠四上參數代表變量的長度，第5個指明參數的值。

sentences.english: River channels indicate a weak point in the crust, a point where pulling apart is most likely to happen.
sentences.chinese: 河道指明瞭地殼的薄弱點，那裏最可能發生撕裂。

sentences.english: A hovering mar-of-war bird showed him where dolphin were chasing some flying fish.
sentences.chinese: 鳥給他指明瞭海豚追逐飛魚的地方。

sentences.english: The report does not specify the brand names of any formula tested.
sentences.chinese: 這份報告並未指明經檢測的產品的商標。

sentences.english: The policy also states that tattoos must be covered.
sentences.chinese: 規定還指明，紋身必須被衣物所覆蓋。

sentences.english: THE Bible designates two things which are at absolute enmity with God.
sentences.chinese: 聖經指明瞭兩件完全與上帝爲敵的事。

sentences.english: I must point out that further delay would be unwise.
sentences.chinese: 我必須指明再延誤就要喫大虧了。

sentences.english: Will people be discouraged if we point out this backwardness as an objective fact?
sentences.chinese: 如實地指明這種落後狀況，會不會使人們失去信心呢？

sentences.english: It shall BE duly executed by or on BEhalf of each mortgagor in the specified manner.
sentences.chinese: 須由每名抵押人或其代表按指明方式妥爲籤立。

sentences.english: They found a 24-fold rise in adenosine, which seemed promising.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現，腺苷增加了24倍，這似乎指明瞭方向。

definition: to point towards/aimed at/facing/the direction indicated
a way out (lit. and fig.)/opportunity for advancement/a way forward/outlet (for one's products)
to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
